sub_topic: Calculating the surface area of a cube.
message_1: What is the total surface area of a cube with a side length of 5 cm?
message_2:
The total surface area of a cube can be found using the formula:

Surface area = 6 × (side length)²

In this case, the side length is 5 cm. So, the surface area is:

Surface area = 6 × (5 cm)²
Surface area = 6 × 25 cm²
Surface area = 150 cm²

The total surface area of the cube is 150 square centimeters.
